column4: I want to remove Samba, and then re-install it later.  I'm using Synaptic to remove Samba.  However one of the additional packages it wants to remove is ubuntu-desktop.  Whats that all about
isnt that the same as using the remove feature in Synaptic
any idea what ubuntu-desktop is and if I allow it to be removed will I no longer have a desktop
that is a metapackage it is safe to remove
